english.segment1: VERSE 1. Keep my heart amazed. Let me see Your wonders every day. Teach me in Your ways. So that I may fear. You are walking on water. You are calling me after. You are standing beside me now
english.segment2: CHORUS. You are the Maker of Heaven. You turn my world around. You're making all things new again. Through it all I know. You are God alone
english.segment3: VERSE 2. Set my heart on fire. Let me burn. With passion for Your name. Take over my life. I surrender now
english.segment4: BRIDGE. Hallelujah. Hallelujah. Hallelujah. You are God alone.
